caller_intent: The caller wanted to confirm that an automatic payment for a workers' compensation claim was being processed correctly and verify the payment amount.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the payment was set up for auto pay.
Agent verified the payment amount ($986.10) with the customer.
Agent assured the customer the payment was scheduled for the same day.
Agent offered further assistance, which the customer declined.
summary: Agent Amanda confirmed with a customer that their workers' compensation payment was set up for auto pay and verified the $986.10 amount. The customer confirmed the payment was scheduled and expressed no further concerns. The call concluded with both parties confirming the payment would proceed as expected.
